name: Apache Cassandra
author: p.zarrad@outlook.de
description: Apache Cassandra is an open source NoSQL distributed database trusted by thousands of companies for scalability and high availability without compromising performance. Linear scalability and proven fault-tolerance on commodity hardware or cloud infrastructure make it the perfect platform for mission-critical data.

installation.script:
#!/bin/sh
# Switch to mounted directory
cd /mnt/server
# Cleanup previous install if available
find . -maxdepth 1 ! -name "conf" ! -name "data" ! -name . -exec rm -rf {} \;
if [ -d "conf" ]; then mv conf conf.bak; fi
# Download and extract Cassandra
curl -L https://mirrors.ae-online.de/apache/cassandra/${CASSANDRA_VERSION}/apache-cassandra-${CASSANDRA_VERSION}-bin.tar.gz --output cassandra.tar.gz
tar -zxvf cassandra.tar.gz
mv -n apache-cassandra-*/* ./
rm -rf cassandra.tar.gz apache-cassandra*
# Create startup script
curl -L https://raw.githubusercontent.com/parkervcp/eggs/master/database/nosql/cassandra/start.sh --output start.sh
chmod 755 start.sh
# Restore custom config
if [ -d "conf.bak" ]; then rm -rf conf; mv conf.bak conf; rm -rf conf.bak; fi

variables.name: Cassandra Version
variables.description: The version of Cassandra to install. By default the latest version is being installed.

variables.name: Cassandra Username
variables.description: The username used when connecting to the started Cassandra, to make a CQLSH available in the Pterodactyl console. This value must be set to an existing user for the egg to work properly. You can create a custom user and enter it here instead of using the default one.

variables.name: Cassandra Password
variables.description: The password used when connecting to the started Cassandra, to make a CQLSH available in the Pterodactyl console. This value must be set to the password of the user specified using the "Cassandra Username" variable. It is highly recommended to change the password of the default Cassandra user right after the first start. After updating the password on the server, update this variable too for the egg to work properly!
